summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated September 27, 2019, transmitting a document titled 'MCC Pros Memo_v10.doc' for review. The email indicates coordination among prosecutors regarding the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Sender of the email transmitting the 'MCC Pros Memo' document for review.

events.title: Transmission of MCC Prosecution Memo
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails a document titled 'MCC Pros Memo_v10.doc' to recipients for review.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated September 27, 2019, from an Assistant United States Attorney.
The email transmits an attachment titled 'MCC Pros Memo_v10.doc' for review.
The correspondence originates from the Southern District of New York, indicating prosecutorial activity in the Epstein case.
The version number 'v10' suggests the memo underwent multiple revisions.
The subject 'MCC Pros Memo' likely refers to a prosecution memo related to the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) where Epstein was held.
